thread.title: Pathology jobs to go in South Australia
thread.title_full: Pathology jobs to go in South Australia

title: Pathology jobs to go in South Australia
text:
Fri, Jul 17, 2015, 12:54 PM AEST - Australia Markets close in 3 hrs 6 mins Pathology jobs to go in South Australia AAP â€“ 5 minutes ago Print 
More than 300 jobs will be cut from SA Pathology over the next three years to save more than $42 million. 
The cuts follow a review of pathology services, which found them to be safe and high quality but significantly less efficient than those interstate. 
SA Health chief executive David Swan says accepting the recommendations of the review will help deliver better pathology services to the community. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook Terms
